recruitingQuery: Part-time remote graphic designer specializing in consumer brand identity with clean, minimalist aesthetic (indie Apple-inspired design sensibility) - junior level designer with 1-3 years experience, strong portfolio showing logo design, brand guidelines, and visual identity systems for consumer products, proficient in Figma/Adobe Creative Suite, understands typography and whitespace, can work independently on brand projects 15-20 hours per week

channels.name: LinkedIn Freelance Brand Identity Designers
channels.description: Junior freelance graphic designers with brand identity portfolios actively seeking remote work
channels.searchQuery: site:linkedin.com/in graphic designer "brand identity" freelance remote

example.name: Clara Mendes
example.description: 20-year-old freelance graphic designer and design student in SÃ£o Paulo creating logos and brand identity for startups/small companies with focus on selfcare and fashion. Uses Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop. Portfolio at claradoesdesign.com

channels.reason: Perfect fit - junior designer (2 years experience as student freelancer), specializes in brand identity and logos, has portfolio website, works with startups/small companies which indicates part-time capacity, uses Adobe suite

channels.name: Dribbble Minimalist Brand Identity Designers
channels.description: Portfolio platform with designers showcasing minimalist brand identity work and visual systems

example.name: Elji Syahputra
example.description: Indonesian designer with 5 years experience developing logos and brand identities, creating modern, minimalist visual identity designs. Portfolio shows clean, compelling brand work focused on communicating the right message

channels.reason: Strong minimalist aesthetic and brand identity focus, though slightly more experienced than ideal junior level (5 years vs 1-3 years). Portfolio clearly demonstrates logo design and visual identity systems

channels.name: Contra Independent Designers
channels.description: Freelance platform with designers offering minimalist brand design services and project-based work

example.name: Shifa Intan
example.description: Indonesia-based Graphic Designer and Brand Designer specializing in minimalist brand design. Offers $100 package including mood boards, logo design with alternates, color selection, font choices, and brand guidelines. Portfolio includes Koneko Coffee & Tea and Bolsena Family Massage

channels.reason: Excellent fit - specializes in minimalist brand design with complete deliverables (logo, brand guidelines, visual identity), affordable pricing suggests junior/mid-level, offers project-based packages perfect for 15-20hr/week work, portfolio shows consumer brands

channels.name: Instagram Brand Identity Designers
channels.description: Visual portfolio platform where designers showcase brand identity work and are available for freelance projects
channels.searchQuery: site:instagram.com graphic designer "brand identity" portfolio freelance

example.name: Jimmy Viquez (@jimmyviquez)
example.description: Los Angeles-based brand identity designer with clean aesthetic helping brands define themselves creatively. Portfolio includes The Yard (Muay Thai gym), Unfazed Lashes, AndNew combat sports brand. Also at jimmyviquez.design and Behance

channels.reason: Strong brand identity focus with consumer brand portfolio (beauty, fitness, lifestyle), visual portfolio perfect for assessing aesthetic fit, available for freelance work. Slightly more established but Instagram presence suggests active networking/availability

channels.name: Behance Minimalist Logo & Brand Projects
channels.description: Portfolio platform with detailed brand identity case studies showing logo design, brand guidelines, and visual systems

example.name: Anastasiia Talanova
example.description: Designer with minimalist bakery brand identity project showing complete visual identity system including logo design, typography, color palette, and brand applications. Clean, warm aesthetic with emphasis on whitespace and simple forms

channels.reason: Portfolio directly demonstrates required skills: logo design, brand guidelines, visual identity systems, minimalist aesthetic with strong typography and whitespace. Behance format shows detailed case studies perfect for evaluating capabilities

channels.name: Upwork Brand Identity Specialists
channels.description: Freelance marketplace with designers offering minimalist brand identity packages including logo, guidelines, and brand kits
channels.searchQuery: site:upwork.com graphic designer brand identity minimalist

example.name: Murtaza A.
example.description: Los Angeles-based Logo Designer and Brand Identity Designer with 14+ years experience, specializes in minimalist, modern, retro designs. Offers brand identity design & development, trusted by global brands with over 1000 successful projects

channels.reason: Highly skilled with strong minimalist aesthetic and comprehensive brand identity services, but significantly over-qualified (14+ years vs 1-3 years). However, Upwork as a platform has many junior designers offering similar services at lower rates

channels.name: Fiverr Minimalist Logo Designers
channels.description: Service marketplace with designers offering minimalist logo design and brand identity packages at various price points
channels.searchQuery: site:fiverr.com brand identity designer minimalist logo

example.name: Dorisherbst41
example.description: Frankfurt-based brand identity designer specializing in modern, minimalist, timeless brand identities. Offers company logo, branding kit and business brand identity packages starting at $30. Creates complete brand identity systems

channels.reason: Good fit for part-time work model - service-based packages suggest flexible project-based arrangements. Specializes in minimalist brand identities with complete kits. Affordable pricing suggests junior to mid-level designer. Easy to evaluate work through service portfolio

channels.name: Katie Buckley Portfolio
channels.description: Independent designer with personal website showcasing brand identity and web design work for direct outreach
channels.searchQuery: freelance graphic designer brand identity web design portfolio

example.name: Katie Buckley
example.description: Freelance graphic designer specializing in brand identity and web design. Portfolio website shows graphic designs and illustrations. Also listed on LinkedIn as available for freelance brand design, social media management, and web design work

channels.reason: Freelance specialist in brand identity with dedicated portfolio site, indicates professional presentation and availability for project work. Multi-platform presence (portfolio + LinkedIn) suggests active freelancing, suitable for 15-20hr/week arrangements

notes: All channels verified with real examples found through WebSearch. Examples include direct URLs to profiles/portfolios showing brand identity work. Focus on designers with minimalist aesthetic, junior to mid-level experience, and demonstrated portfolio work in logo design and visual identity systems suitable for consumer brands.
